document_data.name: Dethaera Matchlass
document_data.mainbody: '''Dethaera Matchlass''' was a participant in a ritual of the mid-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: At the end of her ritual, she had gained knowledge of so many spells it hurt.
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|1372}}, Dethaera was a participant in a [[Magefire ritual]], which unfortunately coincided with the moment when [[Mystra]] noticed that [[Elminster Aumar]] had become trapped in [[Avernus]]. In her distress, amongst other effects, Dethaera's gentle floating became a soaring, and she gained knowledge of spell after spell, in a painful manner.
